extensionDescription.description: Extension description shown in the options page and as short description on addons.mozilla.org.

extensionsLongDescription.description: Long description displayed on addons.mozilla.org. Don’t forget to change links for the current language. You can copy translated permissions from your language version of https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/permission-request-messages-firefox-extensions.

browserActionTitle.description: Tooltip shown when hovering the toolbar button.

optionsSwitchLastActiveTabExplanation.message: Clica la pestanya activa per canviar a la última activa
optionsSwitchLastActiveTabExplanation.description: Explanation for the Compact Mode option in options page.

optionsCompactModeExplanation.message: El mode compacte redueix la alçada de les pestanyes per mostrar més d'elles. En la configuració dinàmica, s'activarà quan no quedi espai.
